She rolled it down. “Did you change your mind about trying to sway my decision?” “Huh-uh. I just wanted to say I had a great time with you tonight.” “Me too.” “I’ll hear from you tomorrow? I’m not a master. I’m just a simple rancher. Right. Bennett McKay was the most complex man she’d ever met. Them two are gonna have to do something different than splitting their time between Jessie’s place and Brandt’s place. Every time they stay at Jessie’s, he’s late.”
